article_html: Two men have been shot dead at a 'draw the prophet' Muhammad contest near Dallas, Texas. A security officer was reportedly also injured after he shot at the men, who drove up to the event and shot at a guard, authorities said. Police shot and killed the men, authorities also said. The American Freedom Defense Initiative had been hosting the exhibition and competition
text: Two men have been shot dead at a 'draw the prophet' Muhammad contest near Dallas, Texas. A security officer was reportedly also injured after he shot at the men, who drove up to the event and shot at a guard, authorities said. Police shot and killed the men, authorities also said. The American Freedom Defense Initiative had been hosting the exhibition and competition
title: Two dead after gunmen attack 'draw the prophet' anti-Islam art show in Texas - video
